channel.title: Ingenic-T31 on Messing with Code So You Don’t Have To

item.title: Reverse Engineering an ANJIA AJ-L73PA1250 PTZ IP Camera
item.description: A technical reverse-engineering analysis of a low-cost PTZ IP camera, including UART access, firmware extraction, and undocumented backdoors.
